title: English Language Familiarization Quiz - Medium Difficulty
description: Enhance your English skills with this quiz focusing on sentence construction, vocabulary, and common expressions.
instructions: Write your answer in English, focusing on correct usage and grammar.
After completing all questions, submit your answers for evaluation.

items.question: Use the correct passive form: 'Someone cleans this room every day.'
items.suggestedAnswer: This room is cleaned every day.

items.question: Explain the meaning of the idiom 'to bite off more than one can chew'.
items.suggestedAnswer: To take on a task that is too big or beyond one's ability.

items.question: Choose the correct past perfect tense form: 'We ___ (leave) the house when she called.'
What does the phrasal verb 'to back out' mean?
items.suggestedAnswer: To withdraw from a commitment or promise.

items.question: Select the correct word: 'His ___ (perspective/prospective) on the issue was quite unique.'
Convert to reported speech: 'Tom said, "I am feeling ill today."'
items.suggestedAnswer: Tom said that he was feeling ill that day.

items.question: Fill in the blank: 'Despite the heavy rain, they continued ___ their journey.'
What does the word 'taciturn' mean?
items.suggestedAnswer: Reserved or uncommunicative in speech; saying little.

items.question: Rewrite in future continuous tense: 'She will attend the meeting.'
items.suggestedAnswer: She will be attending the meeting.
